snippet: The Day: Tuesday's parade for the Giants in Lower Manhattan follows a long and erratic tradition, one with honors for astronauts and athletes, a young pianist and even assorted despots, monarchs and strongmen.
abstract: The Day: Tuesday's parade for the Giants in Lower Manhattan follows a long and erratic tradition, one with honors for astronauts and athletes, a young pianist and even assorted despots, monarchs and strongmen.

headline.main: Time Was, More to Hail Than Athletes Alone
